headline: The Dow Lost Steam. It's Hovering Near Breakeven.
summary: The Dow lost steam on Thursday after the blue-chip index neared its highest levels on record.  The S&P 500 was down 0.6%, while the Nasdaq Composite was down 1.2%.  The Dow is generally less exposed to Big Tech than the other major indexes because it weighs members by stock prices and lacks key Magnificent Seven stocks like Meta Platforms, Alphabet, and Tesla, but Microsoft, down 3.3%, shaved 110 points due to its large stock price.

headline: EG Q3 Earnings & Revenues Miss Estimates on Poor Underwriting Show
summary: Everest Group's Q3 results reflect declining premiums, underwriting loss and higher expenses, offset by narrower catastrophe losses and improved net investment income.

headline: What the Latest Tech Partnership Means for Travelers Companies Stock Value in 2025
summary: Ever wondered if Travelers Companies is actually a bargain right now, or if the recent buzz is just hype? You are not alone. We are diving in to figure out the real value behind this stock. Although Travelers Companies is up an impressive 140.6% over five years, the stock has dipped by 3.1% over the past month. This hints at shifting investor sentiment and possible new opportunities or risks. In recent weeks, Travelers Companies made headlines for expanding its partnership with a major tech...
